newsitem.title: UK: Highams plans Alternative Market listing.
newsitem.headline: Highams plans Alternative Market listing.

text.p: Highams Systems Services Group, a Surrey-based supplier of IT products and business services to the financial sector, said on Monday it plans to list on the London Stock Exchange's Alternative Investment Market.
"The flotation on the Alternative Investment Market will enhance the profile of Highams in a rapidly-growing market and help to grow our business organically," said chief executive John Higham.
The issue, sponsored by Teather and Greenwood, will raise 650,000 stg for the company.
